summary: Mod that replaces the Bethesda Softworks logo when you start up the game to the SEGA Dreamcast boot screen.
descriptionHtml:
A Skyrim Mod that will change the Bethesda Softworks intro logo you start up the game to the Metal Gear Solid Konami logos.

INSTALLATION:

1. Go to (Skyrim Installation Folder)\Data\Video
2. Rename or move BGS_Logo.bik inside the folder somewhere else.
3. Copy the BGS_Logo.bik from the mod archive into (Skyrim Installation Folder)\Data\Video

UNINSTALLATION:

1. Replace BGS_logo.bik with the original one you renamed or moved during the installation.

All rights to the SEGA Dreamcast belong to SEGA of America. I own nothing.
author: OutbackSam
